title: Soft Pink Everyday Look
steps: Prep your skin with a lightweight moisturizer.
Apply a light coverage foundation or BB cream.
Use a soft pink shimmer on the lids.
Finish with mascara and a pink lip tint.

title: 5-Min Class-Ready Face
steps: Dot tinted moisturizer and blend with fingers.
Conceal under eyes and blemishes.
Brush brows up with clear gel.
Swipe tinted balm on lips and cheeks.

title: Office Soft Glam
steps: Prime for a smooth, long-wear base.
Apply medium coverage foundation and set T-zone.
Sweep matte browns on lids; define lash line with brown liner.
Add mascara and a soft contour.
Finish with matte nude lipstick.

title: Party Shimmer Eyes
steps: Apply glowy primer and full coverage base.
Pack metallic shadow on lids and blend edges.
Create a wing with liquid liner.
Coat lashes with volumizing mascara.
Set with spray for long wear.

title: Wedding Soft Rose
steps: Hydrate and prime for longevity.
Apply long-wear foundation and concealer.
Blend rose gold eyeshadow; add individual lashes.
Apply cream blush and highlight.
Set with powder on T-zone only.

title: Monochrome Mauve
steps: Prime and apply cream foundation.
Use mauve stick on lids, blend softly.
Tap mauve blush on cheeks and bridge of nose.
Glossy mauve lip to finish for a cohesive look.
